text:
I have gone through multiple video tutorials on YouTube for MEAN, I have got enough theoretical knowledge but not able to decide what type of project will be good for me to develop a good and practical understanding in this language.

can you guys please help me with deciding this?

Thanks in advance.

For just angularjs, just follow learn tutorial from the official documentation, The PhoneCat App.

https://docs.angularjs.org/tutorial 

to use mongo and nodejs with it, create a login application by yourself, learn to create API's in node and consume in angularjs

This article 40 Side Project Ideas for Software Engineers by Tash Postolovski should help.

https://www.codementor.io/npostolovski/40-side-project-ideas-for-software-engineers-g8xckyxef
